commit.message:
trans-decl.c (gfc_get_extern_function_decl): Set DECL_IS_PURE only for functions.

	* trans-decl.c (gfc_get_extern_function_decl): Set DECL_IS_PURE
	only for functions.
	(gfc_build_function_decl): Likewise.

From-SVN: r82132
